title: PROTECT: Yasuo
body: On the skin Project Yasuo his B animation is bugged. When he goes to sheath his sword it doesn't go in the sheath it just floats in the air. I thought maybe he was holding it but his hands aren't on the sword. Also when you have home guard boots and you are running with him his sword kind of pops in and out of his animation. I'm pretty sure its not supposed to look that way.{{champion:157}} {{item:3250}}

replies.body: Thanks for the report! The Homeguard bug is a known issue, but we'll take a look at the recall and see what's going on with his sword. :3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Vcbm4Bbr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-10-17T10:30:20.371+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! The Homeguard bug is a known issue, but we'll take a look at the recall and see what's going on with his sword. :3

you've been looking for 2 months
There is no bug in PROJECT: Yasuo recall animation. He is holding the sword with his FOOT.
